mapper.sql: id, did, pid, price, status, date
mapper.select: select t.*, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, bx.id as bxid,bx.name as bxname, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from dealer_price t left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join productboxinfo bx on t.pid = bx.id left outer join unit u on bx.gu = u.id where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select t.*, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, bx.id as bxid,bx.name as bxname, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from dealer_price t left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join productboxinfo bx on t.pid = bx.id left outer join unit u on bx.gu = u.id where t.status=0 and (bx.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" or de.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%") order by t.date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}

select t.*, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, bx.id as bxid,bx.name as bxname, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from dealer_price t left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join productboxinfo bx on t.pid = bx.id left outer join unit u on bx.gu = u.id where t.status=0 order by t.date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}

select t.*, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, bx.id as bxid,bx.name as bxname, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from dealer_price t left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join productboxinfo bx on t.pid = bx.id left outer join unit u on bx.gu = u.id where t.pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0 order by t.date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}

select t.*, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, bx.id as bxid,bx.name as bxname, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from dealer_price t left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join productboxinfo bx on t.pid = bx.id left outer join unit u on bx.gu = u.id where t.did = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0 order by t.date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}

select t.*, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, bx.id as bxid,bx.name as bxname, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from dealer_price t left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join productboxinfo bx on t.pid = bx.id left outer join unit u on bx.gu = u.id where t.did = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.pid= #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0

select count(*) from dealer_price t left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join productboxinfo bx on t.pid = bx.id where (bx.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" or de.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%") and t.status=0
select count(*) from dealer_price where status=0

select t.*, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, bx.id as bxid,bx.name as bxname from dealer_price t left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join productboxinfo bx on t.pid = bx.id where t.status=0 and bx.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.did = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by t.date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}

select count(*) from dealer_price t left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join productboxinfo bx on t.pid = bx.id where bx.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.did = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0
mapper.insert:
insert into dealer_price
id,
did,
pid,
price,
status,
date,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{box.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update dealer_price
did = #{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pid = #{box.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dealer_price set did = #{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pid = #{box.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
